description: This nutritionally approved muffin recipe makes for the perfect afternoon snack. Packed with bananas and blueberries, these muffins are naturally sweet.
name: Healthier Banana & Blueberry Muffins Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 5 medium ripe bananas, roughly chopped (save 1 for later, thickly sliced)
3 tbs maple syrup (save 1 tbs for later, to serve)
1 cup Macro organic natural yoghurt (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Line a 12-hole, 1/3-cup capacity muffin pan with muffin wraps.
Place banana in a large bowl and mash with a fork until smooth. Add vanilla, oil, cinnamon, syrup, milk and eggs. Stir to combine.

Add flour to banana mixture and stir until just combined. Fold in blueberries. Divide mixture among holes and top with sliced banana. Bake for 25 minutes or until a skewer inserted into centres comes out clean. Cool slightly in pan.
Place yoghurt in a small bowl and drizzle over extra syrup. Serve muffins warm or at room temperature with yoghurt mixture.
